name: get_the_stock_history_by_exchange_code_and_stock_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stocks.
Tool description: Get the the stocks informations using a REST API simple and free.
API description: Fetches the stock history for a specific stock on a given date using the exchange code and stock code.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the stock history in YYYY-MM-DD format.

exchangecode.description: The code representing the stock exchange (e.g., NASDAQ).

stockcode.description: The code representing the specific stock (e.g., AAPL).
